Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3

Class GlobalSupervisor

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.GlobalSupervisor
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI
public class GlobalSupervisor extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
The class GlobalSupervisor implements the supervisor component for simulated runs of the HEM project.

Description

In BCM-CyPhy-Components, simulated runs execute both the components and their DEVS simulators. In this case, the supervisor component is responsible for the creation, initialisation and execution of the global component simulation architecture using models disseminated into the different application components.

White-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-11-13

Author:
Jacques Malenfant
